p:
Conditions (143) and (145) are not any significant restrictions on the characteristics of the system and associated with points of regular approximations done in the computations [ 11, 79]. Inequalities (143) follow from conditions in formula (140). Inequality (145) follows from the expansion of the radical in a series by smallness of

in the Gamow exponent (see Section 2.4.4, formula (78) for

), which is limited to the zero-order approximation. The scaling times offered by Eq. (147) regulate the chaotic dynamics of quantum-classical transitions. We consider them at length in another place [ 12, 13, 14, 28, 79]. Here, they are discussed in a few words.
